talk.author: did:plc:itlxawcltyjh6mcxympjq4l4
talk.utter:
Things nobody tells you about, transition edition: the periodic extremely fucjin weird feelings around your lips when more hair follicles are activating and new hairs struggle to be born.

Cis dude friends, you have failed me.

talk.author: did:plc:tbig7qnx4o5ylp5v23w577vl
talk.utter: the phenomenology of beards is not well communicated in the cis dude folkways I dunno, I think "what the hell is happening" is really giving you the full experience

talk.author: did:plc:itlxawcltyjh6mcxympjq4l4
talk.utter: Someone should warn people about the weird lip feelings!!! I will be informing everyone I know!

talk.author: did:plc:itlxawcltyjh6mcxympjq4l4
talk.utter: Look I want to assure you that other than the wild "getting taller" growth spurts, I am going through all the wild physical changes of a testosterone fueled puberty here. The emotional shit is kinda damped down by me having life experience, thankfully.

talk.author: did:plc:kefkvmtqpy2j5f4mv4zp75qc
talk.utter: Wait.  WTF?   You get taller?  Like genuinely taller??

talk.author: did:plc:itlxawcltyjh6mcxympjq4l4
talk.utter: No. I said "other than". I am not doing the wild growth spurts, I am 47 years old.
